trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<input type= submit>" name="<input type= submit>" href=""></xref> element on the server.
trans-unit.target: Permite o acesso programático para HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<input type= submit>" name="<input type= submit>" href=""> </xref> elemento no servidor.

trans-unit.source: The HtmlInputSubmit class is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> class and is used to create a button control on a Web page that submits a form.
trans-unit.target: A classe HtmlInputSubmit é derivada de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>classe e é usado para criar um controle de botão em uma página da Web que envia um formulário.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>

trans-unit.source: The HtmlInputSubmit control is often used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset> control, which resets form controls to their initial values.
trans-unit.target: O controle de HtmlInputSubmit geralmente é usado com o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset>controle, que redefine os controles de formulário com seus valores iniciais.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of HtmlInputSubmit, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de HtmlInputSubmit, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit"></xref> class using default values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit"> </xref> classe usando valores padrão.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra o valor da propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>

| Propriedade | Valor | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| A cadeia de caracteres de literal "Enviar". |</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit"></xref> class using the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit"> </xref> classe usando o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra o valor da propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>

| Propriedade | Valor | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| O valor de `type` parâmetro. |</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
O tipo de botão de entrada.
